```{r}
r <- rprojroot::is_r_package$make_fix_file()

library(dplyr.benchmark)
library(dplyr)
library(ggplot2)
```


```{r}
plot_data <- 
  get_plot_data() %>%
  filter_(~grepl("dplyr_df", name))
```

```{r}
plot_data %>% 
  ggplot(aes(x = commit_time, y = median_time / 1e9)) +
  geom_line() +
  geom_point() +
  scale_y_continuous(limits = c(0, NA)) +
  facet_wrap(~name, scales = "free_y")
```

```{r}
plot_data %>%
  filter(grepl("filter|mutate", name)) %>% 
  ggplot(aes(x = commit_id, y = median_time / 1e9, color = name, group=name)) +
  geom_line() +
  geom_point()
```
